definition[0]: an area surrounded by a wall or fence, and used for a particular purpose
example[0]: the bear enclosure at the zoo
definition[1]: the act of making an area separate by putting a wall or fence around it
example[1]: the enclosure of arable land for pasture
definition[2]: something that is put inside an envelope with a letter
definition[3]: something, for example an information pack or a contract, put inside an envelope with a letter
example[2]: I refer to your letter and enclosure of 26 January 1999.
